issue: Missing alt text for decorative image
suggestion: Add alt='' for decorative images or provide meaningful alternative text
Use proper label association with htmlFor/id attributes or wrap input in label

issue: Link text 'click here' is not descriptive
suggestion: Use descriptive link text that indicates the destination or purpose

issue: Modal dialog missing proper heading structure
suggestion: Add an h1-h6 element as the first element in the modal for screen reader navigation
Add null check before accessing object properties
Add appropriate autocomplete attribute to help users fill forms more quickly
